PersonalInfos.Name: Ankit Kumar
PersonalInfos.Heading: Backend Developer | .NET | Python | SQL | REST APIs

Summary: Detail-oriented and versatile Software Developer with experience in backend development using .NET (Framework & Core) and Python. Skilled in building RESTful APIs, automating workflows, and working with both SQL and NoSQL databases including MongoDB. Strong foundation in data structures, object-oriented programming, and clean code practices. Hands-on experience with database design and basic frontend integration. Passionate about building practical tools and continuously learning new technologies. Looking for an impactful backend role where I can solve real-world problems, contribute to scalable systems, and grow as a developer.

Certifications.Title: Data Structures and Algorithms in Java
Data Structures and Algorithms Using Python

Responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable, production-grade backend systems for flight operations using .NET and Python.
Integrated multiple third-party airline APIs to enable live booking, fare search, and ticketing functionalities.
Built internal tools and microservices to automate repetitive tasks and streamline operational workflows.
Optimized SQL and NoSQL database queries and cache usage to enhance system performance and response times.
Designed and deployed scheduler services for automated monitoring, alerting, and report generation.
Identified, diagnosed, and resolved production bugs and user-reported issues to ensure system stability and customer satisfaction.

Projects.Description: Built and maintained flight booking services that interacted with third-party airline APIs such as Travelport, Sabre, Indigo, Akasa, Air India Express, Flycreative, Vicky, Lords Travels, Travelopedia, PKfare, and various NDCs. Collaborated on API-related tasks including debugging, feature enhancement, and ensuring smooth integration flows. Implemented asynchronous patterns to improve responsiveness and optimized caching logic, reducing memory usage by 40%.
Projects.Role: Backend developer responsible for core API logic, external integrations, performance tuning, and ensuring production stability.
Projects.Outcome: Improved API responsiveness and reduced booking latency by 30%, resulting in smoother user experience and fewer API timeouts.

Projects.Description: Developed a secure internal tool for testing flight-related APIs such as search, reprice, more fares, booking, SSRs (seat selection), and rescheduling. Implemented JWT-based authentication and built a user-friendly web interface using AngularJS, with a Flask backend connected to MongoDB. Enabled testing and monitoring of API performance and responses across all active users, agents, partners, and countries where the services are deployed.
Projects.Role: Full-stack developer responsible for backend and frontend development, API communication, and internal deployment.
Projects.Outcome: Reduced QA testing time by over 90% and improved response accuracy tracking across multiple airline partners.

Projects.Description: Created background scheduler services using .NET Core and `Timer` to automate critical tasks like updating booking purchases, currency rates, and airline sectors. Included fraud detection alerts, daily booking reports, and API health monitoring with WhatsApp alerts. Fully deployed and running in production.
Projects.Role: Solo developer responsible for full-cycle development, scheduling logic, and deployment of automated backend services.
Projects.Outcome: Eliminated manual operations, saved ~4 hours of daily team effort, and enabled real-time fraud alerts and currency sync.

Projects.Description:
Developed multiple in-house console applications to boost team productivity and automate manual tasks. Tools included:
• JSON Request Builder – generates structured payloads for C# APIs
• 20-20-20 Eye Reminder – reduces screen strain
• Daily Task Tracker – logs work activities
• Auto Git Pusher – automates daily commits
• New Sector Merger – integrates airline sectors in real time.
Projects.Role: Independently designed and built all tools at EaseMyTrip, focusing on developer experience, internal efficiency, and workflow automation.
Projects.Outcome: Streamlined daily developer operations, reduced repetitive task load, and encouraged healthy coding habits among team members.

Projects.Description: Designed a full-screen digital clock app for tablets and mobile devices. Used for visibility during study sessions, desk timers, and digital wall clocks. Supports 12/24-hour format with custom fonts and themes.
Highlights: Included always-on display mode for night use
Published during college as a practical utility

Projects.Description: Built an interactive math tables app to help kids learn and practice multiplication tables. Includes audio-based teaching, flashcard mode, and a quiz/test module with scoring.
Highlights: Gamified test mode with score tracking

Projects.Description: Created an app to help users practice fast mental math: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Used for improving speed and accuracy, with difficulty scaling and timed test challenges.
Highlights: Designed adaptive test modes (easy to expert)
